body.name: armocity 47 Gaming Computer Desk with LED Lights, Power Outlet and USB, Reversible Laptop Table with Moveable Monitor Stand for Small Spaces, Office, Gaming Room, Black
features: Desk with USB Charging Station & Power Outlets - Armocity computer desk comes with 3 outlets and 2 USB ports for your table lamp, pad, phone, audio equipment, pc monitor and gaming gear with fast charging, you don't need to add an additional charger. The length of the cable is 6.57FT long.
Small Desk for Small Spaces - This 48 inch small desk has 2 storage shelves, you can store a lot of things and it is a perfect small desk for your small space.

Desk with Moveable Monitor Stand Shelf - Armocity desk with monitor stand is an ergonomic design. The moveable monitor stand can adjust the height of your monitor and when you sit down and start work or play pc gaming, it will make you use the correct sitting position.
Reversible Charging Sation Design - This small computer desk with a reversible design, you can put the small black desktop on the right or left. So the charging port can be left or right.

WARRANTY - Armocity offer 2 YEAR WARRANTY for our 48'' computer desk. If you have any questions when you install this computer gaming desk or received damage, please just contact with us, Armocity customer support will solve all the problems for you in one day.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Armocity aims to let you enjoy life while using Armocity furniture. Do you feel annoyed when your monitor can't be adjustable and you need to find an extra charging station for your desk when you use the desk? Armocity computer table meets all your demands. And it is a perfect small desk for your small space. It can be used as a computer desk, gaming desk, laptop desk, teens' study table, workstation desk. It is also a perfect gift for your kids’ writing study table which provides you with enough space for study use or home office use. Advantages Built-in Charger Station - Armocity small desk has 3 USB ports and 2 power outlets on the top of the desk, No more messy cords hanging out of your room.Moveable Monitor Shelf - The top shelf is nice for monitor placement and keeps the monitor at a healthy height instead of desk-level. It is an ergonomic design and will make you use the correct sitting position.Thick Deskboard and Sturdy Metal Frame - This desk has a super thick desk board and metal frame, and it is thick enough to clip a dual monitor mount. The weight capacity: 300 lbs. Specification Color: Black, Desk Size: 47.2’’ (Length) * 19.69’’(Width)* 29.6’’(Height), Monitor Shelf Size: 23.6’’ (Length) * 7.8’’ (Width)* 2.7’’ (Height), Length of Charging Cable: 6.57FT (2M), Charging Station Type: 3 charging outlets + 2 USB ports. Weight Capacity: 300 lbs. What you will get in one package: 1 * Small Desk with Outlets and USB，1 * Monitor Stand Shelf，2 * Iron Hooks, 1 * Installation Instruction, 1 * Full Set Install Accessory. Warm Tips: ✔ Please make sure that you use the correct screw. Using the incorrect screw to assemble the 48 inch table will sure cause the pc table’s board to split or break. ✔ If you want to shorten the installation time you can use your own electric screwdriver to tighten up the screw. ✔Children are not allowed to climb on the computer gaming desk for safety use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, sturdy and made of excellent material.
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful, sturdy and made of excellent material. The material isn’t that cheap wood it’s an amazing quality made desk. It was very easy to assemble and the light’s work perfect. Highly recommend for any child looking for a new fun desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We live the way it fits in the space and lights up with the computer it looks great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great gaming desk
reviews.reviewText: sorry i don’t have a photo but overall it’s pretty good desk, instructions are easy to read, took me about 3 hours to build on my own tho so it’ll give good to have some help, was missing like 2 pieces but those pieces didn’t really matter all that pieces that mattered were there. my pc fit pretty great and i have a pretty big PC so it fit perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great durable desk. Plenty of supplies space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Armocity computer desk W/Led
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ordered this for my son and must I say he loves it! It's sturdy, pretty simple to assemble not too much of an hassle at all. It came with all correct pieces and tools no scratches/ marks etc.. got it in the color gray, I have no complaints about this item it was worth the buy!.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Wife's Work Desk
reviews.reviewText: Got it for my wife for Christmas and it has been her work desk ever since. She loves that she had a choice of setting it as right or lift aligned, and the outlets on top make plugging in chargers and peripherals so simple. Has enough room for dual monitor setup and RGB. Great buy. Simple to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Holes don’t line up. Some holes missing altogether.
reviews.reviewText: One piece the hole was over an inch in the wrong place. Impossible to put the 2 parts together. Another piece was supposed to have 2 holes on one side, 2 on another side. It only had one set. I checked multiple times to make sure I wasn’t just putting things in the wrong space and had someone else check. Couldn’t get the desk together so it is unusable at this point .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: All seemed to be going well. Easy set up and the finish looks nice. But... the top attaches at the end of both sides but not the middle as instructed. There are holes in the middle but no receptacles to drill the screws. The defect makes the desktop a bit flimsy. Then, the side bag can't be attached as shown because the holes are to low on the bag. Finally, the wooden top does not attach to the desktop so I wouldn't want to put monitors on it. I'll probably use the top as firewood.All in all, I got what I paid for. It's basically cheap. I'll use it but not for anything special.

reviews.reviewerName: David Tellez De la ODavid Tellez De la O
reviews.reviewText: Buen tamaño, buena forma, ensambla todo sin problema ademas que el instructivo es bastante claro, las luces lucen bastante bien y sobre todo que las puedes manejar con una app.Llego con un par de imperfecciones minúsculas (ligeras manchas en la madera), nada que afecte en realidad.

Después de leer varias reseñas de este producto tenia miedo de que saliera dañado, defectuoso o que le hicieran falta piezas. Leí varias reseñas de personas cuyo producto llegaba dañado por el viaje, o que las piezas no encajaban en su lugar, también que era complicado de armar y que las instrucciones no eran claras, por esto tenia miedo de comprar este producto y que me pasara alguna de estas cosas.A pesar de todo el miedo este producto me sorprendió bastante:Ensamble:Como podrán ver viene con un instructivo algo corto pero especifico y detallado de como armar el escritorio, es muy claro en como unir las piezas y cuales usar, cada pieza cuenta con una letra o numero, las bigas o tablas cuentan con una letra para identificarlas y los tornillos cuentan con números, y el instructivo es claro en que usar y como usarlo. A pesar de varias reseñas que decían lo contrario, cada pieza encaja perfectamente en su lugar y no hay imperfecciones EXCEPTO: en la unión de las tablas negra y blanca, la imperfección es mínima, de aproximadamente .5mm (no es ni un milímetro) y como en mi caso uso un mousepad gigante no se percibe en lo absoluto, si tu trabajo es deslizar muchas cosas por la mesa (lo cual no se en que se puede aplicar) pues podrás nivelarlo con un pequeño pedazo de papel antes de atornillar.Estabilidad:El escritorio es estable y no se tambalea, si tu piso cuenta con desnivel o alguna imperfección, este cuenta en sus patas niveladores para que no se tambalee en la superficie.Tamaño y diseño:Su tamaño es claro como el que indica en su descripción, no cambia en nada y tiene un diseño excelente para trabajo ya que es amplio.Conexiones eléctricas:Pues respecto a esto solo puedo decir que funciona correctamente, es básicamente una extensión jaja así que hace su trabajo, lo que no se es su certificación y que tan confiable es, por ello recomiendo solo conectar lamparas, celular o cosas portátiles para cargar, no recomendaría conectar en esta el monitor o la computadora, y claro también recomendaría tener todo conectado a un regulador eléctrico.En Resumen:Un gran producto por su precio, estable y confiableYo le daría una calificación de 4.8/5 ya que donde se posa el monitor no se puede sujetar a nada (aunque claro, nunca dice que se pueda), y otra cosa negativa pero insignificante, es que los agarres donde se pueden colocar los audífonos, me hubiera gustado también poder colocarlos del lado izquierdo, porque como aprecian en las imágenes el lado donde están, apuntan a la pared jajaja, pero yaEn mi opinión se merece la calificación que le puseGracias por leer !
